mapper.select: select member_thumb, member_id, community_no, community_content, to_char(community_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as community_date, community_status from community join member using(member_no)

select member_thumb, member_id, community_no, community_content, to_char(community_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as community_date, community_status from community join member using(member_no) where community_no = #{communityNo}
